Reviews.Title: Maybe if you move to Europe??
Reviews.Author: TIM ORROK
Reviews.Content: The LG  GT540  is pretty, light weight, and promises well.(1) My first concern ?  The plug-in charger  had two ROUND tines. It was for European use.I called J&R; who have promised to send me an adaptor.(2) I believe in reading manuals.  This one is titled "Gula do Utilizador."  Pocket size, it has 100 pages in PORTUGUESE!  It also has 13 pages in English .  If you Google GT540,  you will get a very nice web-site (/uk/) with you-tube videos which show you how to take off the back, install your Sim card, your micro-SD card (not supplied, you need it for taking pictures), and the battery.  Press the "On" button.(3)Someplace (probably the video) it says the phone will wake up and present the "Settings" sub-screen for "Languages".  Mine just came up speaking  German.  It took me a while figure the German word for "Settings."  I reset "SPRACHE" to English.  I began to feel pretty good. I like the look. I can read the icons,  activate the Wi-Fi.  But I wanted the phone to interface with my computer. Objectives: download the manual, and finish setting up. I plugged in the USB cable. Windows can't cope.(4) The LG web site advised me we needed USB drivers.  No big deal.  But telling the site I had a GT540 turned out to be a bear.  I had to "select" first my Provider. This is an "Unlocked" phone.  I try a few at random, including "T-mobile"  which is what I use. No "provider" includes a "GT540".  I then went to the LG/uk web site where I had watched the  video of the GT540.  I clicked "support" and to Downloads. What next?  "GT540"  does not exist.  The LG540  looks nice.  But I  can't make it work.  GTO

Reviews.Title: LG GT540 Awesome Phone if the SD CARD Slot was working
Reviews.Author: Guro
Reviews.Content: I purchase the LG GT540 phone from the amazon website it was sent to me from JR music.  This is and awesome smartphone for lg its unique design but the only thing why gave this phone 3 star rating is because the phone came faulty.  Everything else work except the SD card slot.  Without that the phone is limited in its performance.  My advise to anyone purchasing this phone is a good buy, but it a chance when you not sure what you are get when the phone reach.

Reviews.Title: If you like phones that glitch and have poor reception well here you have it
Reviews.Author: Ana Gabriel Trevino
Reviews.Content: I rated it at a one star because it's a very low quality phone. I would not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Vincent H Pon
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE: Unlocked phones from J&R; do NOT come with a warranty from the manufacturer.  No where is this stated on the product page.  I purchased on in June, it broke in November. Neither J&R;, LG nor Amazon will warranty it.  I'm short $175 and SOL.

Reviews.Content: Product has a lot of bug, it is horrible, language changes automatically out of the blue.I strongly don't recommend this product, I bought one and came with this bug, and them I changed the product for another one and came with the same problem.
